member_var.var: SELECT EO.EOMGNO AS EOMGNO , EO.EOYEAR AS EOYEAR , EO.EOEXAMORDERGUBUN AS EOEXAMORDERGUBUN , EO.EOMGGTMGNO AS EOMGGTMGNO , EO.EOEXAMORDER AS EOEXAMORDER , EO.EOEXAMDATE AS EOEXAMDATE , TC.TCCOURSECD AS TCCOURSECD , TC.TCCOURSENM AS TCCOURSENM , GTC.GTTEAMNM AS GTTEAMNM , ER.EREXAMROOM AS EREXAMROOM FROM EXAMORDER EO , TRAININGCOURSE TC , G_TEAMCODE GTC , EXAMROOM ER WHERE EO.EOTCCOURSECD = TC.TCCOURSECD AND EO.EOMGNO = ER.EREOMGNO AND TC.TCMUNJEGUBUN = 'N' AND TC.TCSEARCHGUBUN = 'E' AND TC.TCUSEYN = 'Y' AND ER.ERCHASUGUBUN = '1' AND EO.EOMGGTMGNO = GTC.GTMGNO
